package.name: acdk_java
package.title: ACDK Java (acdk_java)
package.shortdescription: acdk_java makes ACDK Objects accessible to Java and Java classes to C++. acdk_java integrate an Java virtual machine into acdk. acdk_java also provides Java compatible serialization of C++ classes.
package.description:
acdk_java connects ACDK Objects with Java objects without the necessarity to write own Java Native Interface (JNI) code.
Using the standard %ref[ACDK DMI, acdk_hb_dmi] features, acdk_java provides following features:
Java can act as an %ref[DMI client for all ACDK DMI server, acdk_java_man_javaobject] applications. Java can act as a DMI server, makes all Java classes acccessible to all ACDK DMI clients. See also %lref[acdk_java_man_acdkobject]. Embedd a Java Virtual Machine inside ACDK C++ applications. See also %lref[acdk_java_man]. With the package %ref[acdk_java_serialization_man] a Java compatible serialization of ACDK C++ Objects is provided. See also %lref[acdk_java_serialization_man].

package.plattforms: Windows. Linux. Note for GCC users: acdk_java doesn't seem to work with GCJ header/libraries. You have to install/use the Java SDK.
